vernac_cmds: Variables (A B C: Type) (JA: Join A) (JB: Join B) (JC: Join C) (f: A -> B -> C).
Definition join_hom2 := forall (a1 a2 a3: A)(b1 b2 b3: B), join a1 a2 a3 -> join b1 b2 b3 -> join (f a1 b1) (f a2 b2) (f a3 b3).
Definition join_hom2' := forall (a1 a2 a3: A)(b1 b2 b3: B), join a1 a2 a3 -> join (f a1 b1) (f a2 b2) (f a3 b3).
Arguments join_hom2 [A B C JA JB JC] _.
Lemma join_hom_id (A: Type) (JA: Join A) : join_hom (fun x => x).
Variables (A A' B B': Type) (JA: Join A) (JA': Join A') (JB: Join B) (JB': Join B') (f: A -> A') (g: B -> B') (join_hom_f: join_hom f) (join_hom_g: join_hom g).
Lemma join_hom2_pair: join_hom2 (fun a b => (f a, g b)).
Lemma join_hom2_pair' : join_hom2 (fun (a: A) (b: B) => (a, b)).
Lemma join_hom_prod : join_hom (fun p => (f (fst p), g (snd p))).
Lemma join_hom_prodA : forall e: B', join e e e -> join_hom (fun a :A => (f a, e)).
unfold join_hom in *; intros; simpl; split; auto.
Lemma join_hom_prodA' : forall e: B, join e e e -> join_hom (fun a :A' => (a, e)).
unfold join_hom in *; split; simpl; auto.
Lemma join_hom_prodB : forall e: A', join e e e -> join_hom (fun b: B => (e, g b)).
unfold join_hom in *; split; simpl; auto.
Lemma join_hom_prodB' : forall e: A, join e e e -> join_hom (fun b : B' => (e, b)).
unfold join_hom in *; simpl; split; auto.
Lemma join_hom_proj1 : join_hom (fun p: A*B => fst p).
Lemma join_hom_proj2 : join_hom (fun p : A*B => snd p).
Arguments join_hom2_pair [A A' B B' JA JA' JB JB'] _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _ _.
Variables (A A' B B': Type) (JA: Join A) (JA': Join A') (JB: Join B) (JB': Join B') (f: A -> A') (g: B -> B') (join_hom_f: join_hom f) (join_hom_g: join_hom g).
Lemma join_hom_sum : join_hom (fun s: A+B => match s with | inl x => inl _ (f x) | inr y => inr _ (g y) end).
destruct x; destruct y; destruct z; firstorder.
Lemma join_hom_sum_l : join_hom (fun s: A+B => match s with | inl x => inl _ (f x) | inr y => inr _ y end).
destruct x; destruct y; destruct z; firstorder.
Lemma join_hom_sum_r : join_hom (fun s: A+B => match s with | inl x => inl _ x | inr y => inr _ (g y) end).
destruct x; destruct y; destruct z; firstorder.
Lemma join_hom_inj_l : join_hom (fun a : A=> inl Void (f a)).
Lemma join_hom_inj_r : join_hom (fun b => inr Void (g b)).
Definition sa_sum_option (s: A+unit): option A := match s with | inl s' => Some s' | inr _ => None end.
Definition option_sa_sum (s: option A): A+unit := match s with | Some s' => inl _ s' | None => inr _ tt end.
Lemma sa_sum__option: forall s, sa_sum_option (option_sa_sum s) = s.
Lemma option__sa_sum: forall s, option_sa_sum (sa_sum_option s) = s.
destruct s; firstorder; destruct u; firstorder.
Definition bij_sa_sum_option : bijection (A+unit) (option A) := Bijection _ _ sa_sum_option option_sa_sum sa_sum__option option__sa_sum.
Lemma join_hom_list_nil : join_hom (fun a => a :: nil).
Lemma join_hom2_list_cons : join_hom2 (fun a l => a :: l).
Variables (Key A: Type) (Key_dec_eq: forall k1 k2: Key, {k1=k2}+{~k1=k2}) (JA: Join A).
Fixpoint lookup k (rho: list (Key*A)) := match rho with | nil => None | (k', a) :: rho' => if Key_dec_eq k k' then Some a else lookup k rho' end.
Lemma join_hom_fun : join_hom (fun env k => lookup k env).
unfold join_hom; intros x y z H.
destruct x as [k1 a1]; destruct y as [k2 a2]; destruct z as [k3 a3].
Lemma join_hom_bij {A: Type} `{Perm_alg A} {B: Type} (bij: bijection A B): @join_hom _ _ _ (Join_bij _ _ _ bij) (bij_f _ _ bij).
Lemma join_hom_join_sub {A}{B}`{Join A}`{Join B}: forall (f: A -> B) a1 a2, join_sub a1 a2 -> join_hom f -> join_sub (f a1) (f a2).
Lemma join_hom_identity {A}{B}`{Perm_alg A}{SA: Sep_alg A}{CA: Disj_alg A}`{Perm_alg B}{SB: Sep_alg B}{CB: Disj_alg B}: forall (f: A -> B) a1, identity a1 -> join_hom f -> identity (f a1).

Lemma join_hom2_identity {A}{B}{C} `{Perm_alg A}{SA: Sep_alg A}{CA: Disj_alg A} `{Perm_alg B}{SB: Sep_alg B}{CB: Disj_alg B} `{Perm_alg C}{SC: Sep_alg C}{CC: Disj_alg C}: forall (g: A -> B -> C) a1 b1, identity a1 -> identity b1 -> join_hom2 g -> identity (g a1 b1).
Lemma join_hom_comparable {A}{B}`{Perm_alg A}{SA: Sep_alg A}`{Perm_alg B}{SB:Sep_alg B}: forall (f: A -> B) a1 a2, comparable a1 a2 -> join_hom f -> comparable (f a1) (f a2).

Lemma join_hom2_comparable {A}{B}{C} `{Perm_alg A}{SA: Sep_alg A}`{Perm_alg B}{SB: Sep_alg B}`{Perm_alg C}{SC: Sep_alg C}: forall (g: A -> B -> C) a1 a2 b1 b2, comparable a1 a2 -> comparable b1 b2 -> join_hom2 g -> comparable (g a1 b1) (g a2 b2).
